description: This Savory Cauliflower Broccoli Pie is full of flavor from the garam masala and has a delicious potato black eyed pea crust. gluten free and grain free.
name: Broccoli Cauliflower Masala Pie
recipeIngredient: 1 cup dry black eyed peas (1.5 cups cooked)
1/2 tsp garam masala (or other herb blend or choice)
a generous dash of black pepper

recipeInstructions.text: Soak 1 cup dry black eyed peas in warm water for an hour then pressure cook for 2 whistles. Let pressure release by itself then open, drain and use. Or use 1.5 cups canned or slow cooked black eyed peas.

Boil the potatoes until well done. Mash the potatoes and black eyed peas well. I used a potato masher. Add the spices and salt and mix well. The mixture will be sticky at this point. Cover and Chill in the refrigerator for an hour. Press and shape into crust when ready to bake.
